info.title: Hetzner Cloud API
info.description: Copied from the official API documentation for the Public Hetzner Cloud.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Datacenters by their name. The response will only contain the Datacenter matching the specified name. When the name does not match the Datacenter name format, an invalid_input error is returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: id id:asc id:desc created created:asc created:desc

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Floating IPs by labels. The response will only contain Floating IPs matching the label selector.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Floating IPs by their name. The response will only contain the Floating IP matching the specified name.

get.summary: Get all Actions for a Floating IP

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

get.summary: Get an Action for a Floating IP

post.summary: Assign a Floating IP to a Server
Change reverse DNS entry for a Floating IP

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: id id:asc id:desc name name:asc name:desc created created:asc created:desc

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: system snapshot backup

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. The response will only contain Images matching the status. Choices: available creating

parameters.name: bound_to
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Server ID linked to the Image. Only available for Images of type backup

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Images by their name. The response will only contain the Image matching the specified name.

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Images by labels. The response will only contain Images matching the label selector.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Image to be updated

get.summary: Get all Actions for an Image

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

get.summary: Get an Action for an Image

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter ISOs by their name. The response will only contain the ISO matching the specified name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Locations by their name. The response will only contain the Location matching the specified name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter networks by their name. The response will only contain the networks matching the specified name.

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter networks by labels. The response will only contain networks with a matching label selector pattern.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the network to update

get.summary: Get all Actions for a Network

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

get.summary: Get an Action for a Network

post.summary: Add a subnet to a Network
Delete a subnet from a Network
Add a route to a Network
Delete a route from a Network
Change IP range of a Network

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. The response will only contain Server matching the status. Choices: initializing starting running stopping off deleting rebuilding migrating unknown

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: id id:asc id:desc name name:asc name:desc created created:asc created:desc

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Servers by their name. The response will only contain the Server matching the specified name.

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Servers by labels. The response will only contain Servers matching the label selector.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of metrics to get cpu disk network

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start of period to get Metrics for (in ISO-8601 format)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End of period to get Metrics for (in ISO-8601 format)

get.summary: Get all Actions for a Server

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

get.summary: Get an Action for a Server

post.summary: Reset root Password of a Server
Enable Rescue Mode for a Server
Disable Rescue Mode for a Server
Rebuild a Server from an Image
Change the Type of a Server
Enable and Configure Backups for a Server
Attach an ISO to a Server
Detach an ISO from a Server
Change reverse DNS entry for this Server
Attach a Server to a Network
Detach a Server from a Network
Change alias IPs of a Network

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Server types by their name. The response will only contain the Server type matching the specified name.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: id id:asc id:desc name name:asc name:desc

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter SSH keys by their name. The response will only contain the SSH key matching the specified name.

parameters.name: fingerprint
parameters.description: Can be used to filter SSH keys by their fingerprint. The response will only contain the SSH key matching the specified fingerprint.

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter SSH keys by labels. The response will only contain SSH keys matching the label selector.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. The response will only contain Volumes matching the status. Choices: available creating

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times. Choices: id id:asc id:desc name name:asc name:desc created created:asc created:desc

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Volumes by their name. The response will only contain the Volumes matching the specified name.

parameters.name: label_selector
parameters.description: Can be used to filter Volumes by labels. The response will only contain Volumes with a matching label selector pattern.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Volume to update

get.summary: Get all Actions for a Volume

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times, the response will contain only Actions with specified statuses Choices: running success error

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Can be used multiple times Choices: id id:asc id:desc command command:asc command:desc status status:asc status:desc progress progress:asc progress:desc started started:asc started:desc finished finished:asc finished:desc

get.summary: Get an Action for a Volume

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Volume to update
